member.name: M:product_categoryApi.Controllers.UserController.Login(product_categoryApi.Models.VM.LoginVMInput)

member.returns: Returns OK status, user data and token in case of success

member.name: M:product_categoryApi.Controllers.UserController.Register(product_categoryApi.Models.VM.RegisterVMInput)
